hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Umar reported the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying; Do not prevent the female servant your women from visiting the mosques of Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ إِلَى الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Narrated Concerning Women Leaving (Their House) For The Masjid
